They are coming out of the tunnel!
He is ahead by a car length!
You have less power left than me, D'Arby!
spun and knocked D'Arby's car off the course!
And it was going at 850 kilometers per hour!
He is out of the course!
The one with less power goes flying.
It seems you were wrong to think that losing power would not matter.
You did not realize that I intentionally dropped a length behind you,
so I could knock you off the course.
It is you who did not realize.
Losing power was all part of my plan.
I lost power on purpose so you would push my car off the course!
This battle is not over yet!
Look at the direction my machine is flying!
I-It flew over the curve and landed further ahead on the course!
Even at 850 kilometers per hour, once you are off the course, you crash into the ground.
You could never reach the next part of the course.
But Kakyoin, if you were to slam into me, it would become possible.
I just needed you to send me flying!
It was all part of my plan to reduce my power, then have you hit me.
Shall we continue the race, Kakyoin?
I now hold his soul in my hands.
He admitted within his heart that it was pointless to continue this race.
But Kakyoin, you are the first to ever make me sweat like this.
This doll is now an especially valuable part of my collection.
He is the first opponent to
overcome his fears and not make any mistakes
I shall treasure it, and take very good care of it.
I would like to warn you against attacking me in retaliation.
If I were to slip on a banana peel and hit my head,
or choke on a piece of gum,
or die of a heart attack from the bang of an inflated popcorn bag being popped,
Kakyoin's soul would pass on to the realm beyond this life.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Old man, have you played any one of these games more than Kakyoin has?
Stay out of this, old man.
This is not like playing cards or hanafuda.
I want you to play this baseball game with me.
I have retrieved my Stand Atum's arm from your arm.
Now that I have Kakyoin's soul,
there is no point in holding on to your arm anymore.
It would put my Stand at a disadvantage
to fight you with only one arm.
Your Star Platinum's movements are extremely fast and super precise.
But to think that you would pick this baseball game...
This is the game I am best at.
As soon as you lose to Jotaro, I will finish you.
There is no trickery in this game.
So you have chosen a team with a strong offense.
Two of your players have batting averages over.400.
Then I shall choose the Red Dragons.
Would you like to bat first or second?
You can draw your own characters to input as the players.
I have chosen 15 to be my pitcher, since I was born on January 5th.
You swung the bat before the ball even left the pitcher's hand!
Why do you keep taking practice swings?
Have you played this baseball gameNo,
have you ever played any video game before?
I know the rules for baseball.
I will figure out the controls as I go.
The way you are working the controls...
This is your first time playing any game, is not it?!
This time, you swung the bat after the ball hit the mitt!
You have never played a video game before, have you?!
Why are you putting on that attitude?!
You should be supportive at times like this.
It is just the first inning.
Even with your Star Platinum's super precise movements,
did you think you could beat him with no knowledge of video games at all?
What on Earth are you thinking?!
Let me warn you that if, on the other hand,
this is some plan to trick me by acting like an amateur,
it is not going to work.
No matter the situation, I never let down my guard.
Once my opponent has wagered his soul, even if he is an infant,
I would give my all to defeat him.
I am not thinking about anything.
as he sits there so certain that he will never lose to anyone in this game.
I am only seriously thinking about getting Kakyoin's soul back.
You can say what you would like...
But it is still the top of the first inning with one out.
Please do not forget that if one of us
takes an eleven-point lead, the game will be called.
This time, the ball was at least 40 centimeters away
from where he swung the bat!
The difference in ability is too obvious.
At this rate, it is as if a tea ceremony club,
where nobody's ever held a bat, decided to challenge a championship team.
It seems he truly is an amateur.
I think I now understand how a judo master feels
when he can gauge his opponent's strength simply
from how he puts on his gi.
When it comes to video games, Jotaro is indeed an amateur.
But I will never let my guard down.
I have memorized the weaknesses of all the batters in this game.
Next will be a low pitch to the outside.
I will throw my ultimate screwball and strike out all three without a single run.
Top of the first, two outs, two strikes and no balls.
I have pretty much learned how to bat now.
Did he just say pretty much learned?
The ball is still in the air!
What did he say just now?!
I have pretty much learned how to bat now.
I have pretty much learned how to bat?
There is no reason for me to say it again.
He was, without a doubt, a beginner.
Is he saying that he managed to learn the controls by swinging eight times?
Jotaro Kujo has Star Platinum, who has the power of super precise movement.
Lord Dio sees him as a problem, and why my brother lost.
This is how my opponents should be.
characteristic of yours in the top of the first inning, right after we started...
Let us continue the game, Jotaro.
Now it is four to nothing in the top of the first.
Looks like you have got the hang of this game, Jotaro.
I am sure you do not want to hear this, but I will say it as a kindness.
If you return Kakyoin's soul right now and take us to Dio,
My brother was a master at gambling,
Yet he never said to me, Brother, why do not we play a game of poker?
Do you know why that is?
When I was fifteen, my brother hit on my girlfriend.
I beat the shit out of him, even though he was ten years older.
I broke his ribs and kicked him until he vomited blood.
To that, all my brother had to say was, I am sorry.
What are you getting at, you bastard?
My brother knew ever since we were children that he had no way of beating me.
He knew there was a reason he could not win.
And now, it appears as if Jotaro is getting excited and really taking off with this game.
However, he is uncertain, just like my brother was as a child.
He is uncertain about my abilities.
That is what he is been thinking.
What the hell are you talking about?

77 is a fastball pitcher, whose fastest pitch clocks in at 165 kilometers per hour.
Specialty: Throws fastballs, but can only throw straights and forkballs.
And I will declare what kind of pitch he will throw.
a forkball straight down the middle.
He will throw a forkball right down the middle.
Will you believe me or not?
Jotaro, he is just playing mind games with you.
Do not let him declaring a pitch get to you.
Will you believe me or not?
It is coming straight down the middle!
But is it going to remain a straight?!
He caught the bottom of the ball!
Top of the first, three outs!
How could you be so stupid?!
He was certain that I would swing for a forkball,
so he changed it to a straight fastball.
As he said, ever since we entered this mansion, I have been uncertain.
He somehow knew that Star Platinum would throw a right punch.
that he is reading your mind?
Next is the bottom of the first.
It is my turn on offense.
This is a declaration that I will hit a home run.
I shall hit the ball you throw into the left stands.
You are certain that the game
and console are not rigged in any way, right?
There is no chance of that.
And I have been keeping my eye out for any kind of cheating.
That means the secret lies with his Stand.
It does not just take souls.
It has some kind of secret power.
The course of action I will take is...
He is going to try to hit the batter on purpose?
Where might you be aiming to throw?
Are you planning some sort of trick?
He dodged at the same time as the pitch was thrown!
There is no way he could have done that without reading Jotaro's mind.
We have met all kinds up until now,
but we have never seen a Stand that could read minds.
If it can read minds, then will no amount of intelligence or power
Wh-What are you going to do, Jotaro?!
H-He is declaring another home run.
Will the next one be outside?
Or will it be a straight?
By analyzing various data and the situation you are in,
you can figure out how an opponent's mind works, to an extent.
But this Stand can anticipate the ball's course with perfect precision.
How can we stop him from reading our minds?
I am going to turn this around soon.
Now, will the next one be inside?
I wonder where it will go.
Do you think I am using underhanded methods, like my brother?
Hiding behind your hat will not help.
He is not reading the reflection of the screen in your eyes.
And it is not a trick where he is listening to your fingers
as they push the buttons to figure out what you are going to do.
That is not what is going on.
This is the first time I have sweat or bled in a while.
That is why I took it off.
I would like you to hurry up and throw your next pitch.
But I do not think I have to worry about sweating anymore.
I am going to declare my pitch.
It is going to be a straight, high to the outside.
What did you just say, Jotaro?!
Are you so old that your hearing's gone, old man?
I said I was going to declare my pitch.
I will throw a straight, high to the outside.
Will you believe me or not?
What did you just say, Jotaro?!
I said I was going to declare my pitch.
Your school hat proves that you are cheating!
It is not cheating if you do not get caught.
The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
